6.4 Controlling execution

6.4.4 Interacting with applications

Application > Interact (or the toolbar interact button ()) pauses the execution of the application with which the window is associated and opens a debugger window on it. The behavior is exactly the same as Application > Debug (see Section 6.5 on page 106) except the stack and source panes of the debugger window are hidden.

See Section 6.9 on page 111 for a discussion of interaction.

Getting Started with Functional Developer - 31 MAR 2000
